content: stay extra warm and cozy on any adventures you have this fall and winter with the wanderlust scarf so many of you mentioned that you loved the wanderlust beanie 1 and how simple it was to make that i had to design a scarf to go with it there is now a matching pair of mittens 2 **this pattern is available for free on my website visit pattern website link above or you can download it here on ravelry as a printable ad-free pdf** there are some differences in the way this scarf is worked row compared to the hat which is worked in the round but i have also included an infinity scarf/cowl version that is worked very similarly to the hat and won t have any wrong side row facing the front as the regular scarf does should that kind of thing bug you this yarn hides most of that though as you can see in my preview pictures but some of you might be perfectionists like me and so i wanted to disclose that up front **difficulty ** easy **materials needed ** 5 5mm i hook 350-375 yards lion brand yarn heartland in joshua tree yarn needle scissors **stitches used ** chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet fpdc = front post double_crochet bpdc = back post double_crochet **gauge ** 13 double_crochet stitches in 4 **measurements ** about 6 ft 7 ft 8 ft long by 6 wide **additional notes ** if you would like to make a cowl or infinity scarf instead i ve included those instructions below the regular scarf instructions you will be working in a circle so things will be slightly different and constructed more like the matching wanderlust beanie 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/wanderlust-beanie 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/wanderlust-mittens
